description: Try our easy to follow Teriyaki & Ginger Salmon recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Teriyaki & Ginger Salmon Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 long red chilli, deseeded, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Cook salmon parcels following packet directions.
Meanwhile, heat a wok over high heat until hot.

Add vegetable oil and swirl to coat. Add garlic and chilli. Stir fry for 1 minute. Add broccolini and stalk ends of bok choy. Stir fry for 2 minutes. Add snow peas and leafy section of bok choy and toss until well combined. Add 2 tbs water. Cover and cook for 2 minutes or until vegetables are tender. Add sesame oil and toss until combined.
Spoon rice onto serving plates. Transfer cooked fish and sauce onto rice and serve with vegetables.
